hero.subtitle: Car import from the USA, Canada, Europe, and China — fast, reliable, and affordable.

items.title: Transparent pricing with no hidden fees

steps.title: Choose a car

steps.title: Pay and receive the car in Ukraine
steps.description: After payment, we arrange delivery and paperwork, and you receive the car in Ukraine.
